ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons chicken soup base (such as Better than Bouillon®)
1 pound cooked jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined with tails on

cookingTips: Mix chicken soup base into whipped cream cheese to create a flavorful, spreadable filling
Use minced olives to add umami and saltiness to the cream cheese base
Wrap each shrimp-topped jalapeno with peppered bacon and bake at 400°F for 18-22 minutes until bacon is crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you position the shrimp tail to make these look like scorpions while keeping the filling secure?
